block.field: TRUE for static test img // FALSE for image from URL (e.g. Grafana rendered img link)
CSS Styling Class for the Graph element
set graph refresh time in seconds

shadow.field:
//Koordinaten am HBK E-Haus
const latitude = 49.2320955;
const longitude = 6.9837566;
const apiUrl = `https://api.sunrise-sunset.org/json?lat=${latitude}&lng=${longitude}&date=today&formatted=0`;

fetch(apiUrl)
 .then(response => response.json())
 .then(data => {
 const sunrise = new Date(data.results.sunrise);
 const sunset = new Date(data.results.sunset);
 
 VARS['timeSunrise'] = sunrise.toLocaleTimeString().slice(0,-3);
 VARS['timeSunset'] = sunset.toLocaleTimeString().slice(0,-3);
 })
 .catch(error => {
 console.error('Error fetching data from the API:', error);
 //Fallback Times
 VARS['timeSunrise'] = "08:00"; 
 VARS['timeSunset'] = "20:00";
 });

var currentDate = new Date();
var hours = currentDate.getHours();
var minutes = currentDate.getMinutes();

// Format the time as HH:MM
VARS['timeCurrent'] = padZero(hours) + ":" + padZero(minutes);

// Function to pad a single digit number with a leading zero
function padZero(number) {
 return (number < 10 ? '0' : '') + number;
}
